mapper.select: select o.payment_status, o.order_idx, o.payment_date, o.count, m.member_idx, bk.bakery_name, b.bread_name, b.bread_price from bc_order o left outer join bc_member m on o.member_idx = m.member_idx left outer join bc_bread b on o.bread_idx = b.bread_idx left outer join bc_bakery bk on o.bakery_idx = bk.bakery_idx where m.member_idx = #{member_idx} order by payment_date desc
